name: SearchLoyaltyRewards
description:
Search for loyalty rewards with optional filters.

This tool searches for loyalty rewards and can retrieve results for all loyalty accounts when no filters are applied. If a query object is used, the `loyalty_account_id` is required, while `status` is optional. Results are sorted by `updated_at` in descending order.

parameters.name: loyalty_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the loyalty account to which the loyalty reward belongs. Required if using a query object.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [loyalty account](entity:LoyaltyAccount) to which the loyalty reward belongs.

parameters.name: reward_status
parameters.description: The status of the loyalty reward. Options: ISSUED, REDEEMED, DELETED.

value_schema.description: The status of the loyalty reward.

parameters.name: maximum_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of loyalty reward results to return. Default is 30.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return in the response. The default value is 30.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of results from a previous call.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to 
this endpoint. Provide this to retrieve the next set of 
results for the original query.
For more information, 
see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).
